name: presentably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is good enough, especially in relation to how someone is dressed: With a little encouragement he would dress presentably, though he preferred jeans, T-shirt, and boots. The orchestra played presentably, even if not up to its usual standard.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cakes and sandwiches were presentably served on silver trays.On a Sunday morning it is sometimes hard to find the energy to dress presentably, gather the family, and get to church on time.
